member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.PercentileAspect
member.summary: Class representing a percentile aspect of the QML.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.PercentileAspect.ToString
member.summary: Creates a string representation of thew object.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute
member.summary:
Describes the time behavior of a service by a list of percentile aspects of the Quality of Service Modeling Language. Usage: Percentile | Value 20% 20ms 40% 77ms 100% 100ms
A percentile and a value together builds a qml aspect. The first line means that 20% of all execution of a service is below 20 ms.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute.Validate(System.Double[],System.Int64[])
member.summary: Checks whether the aspects are in ascending order and the highest percentile is not bigger than 100%.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute.GetQmlDensityFunction
member.summary: Returns the density function of the QMLAttribute.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute.GetAttribute(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable)
member.summary: Returns the QMLAttribute of the object. If it has no QMLAttribute null is returned.
member.param: Object for which the QMLAttribute is requested.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute.ToString
member.summary: Creates a string representation of thew object.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute.Equals(System.Object)
member.param: Object which is compared with this.
member.returns: True if both objects are equal. False else.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute.Clone
member.summary: Returns a flat copy of the QMLAttribute.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QmlDensityFunction
member.summary: Containing the probabilities of the density function and the distance between the values. This function is not equidistant.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer
member.summary: Class for transforming or generating Attributes. All methods are static.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.
WebserverAnalyser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer.CreateProbabilityAttributeForTransition(Palladio.FiniteStateMachines.ITransition)
member.summary: Creates a ProbabilityAttribute for a transition. The probability depends on the measure: NumberOfVisits(transition)/NumberOfVisits(sourceState)
member.param: A Transition with a MeasureAttribute. The source state also must have a Measure Attribute

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer.MeasureAttribute2RandomVariable(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new Random Variable out of the MeasureAttribute.
member.param: SamplingRate of the new random variable

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer.DetermineFrequencyOfEcexutionTimes(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute)
member.summary: Determines the frequency of each execution time of the MeasureAttribute.
member.returns: Hashtable that contains the frequency for each execution time.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer.RandomVariable2QML(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable)
member.summary: Converts a RandomVariable to a QMLAttribute. This is a conversion from density function to distribution function.
member.returns: A new QMLAttribute equivalent to the RandomVariable.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer.Qml2RandomVariable(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute)
member.summary: Creates a RandomVariable out of a QML Specification. This is a conversion from distribution function to density function. The aspects must be defined in ascending order.
member.returns: A new RandomVariable which density function has a fixed samplingrate.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.AttributeTransformer.ComputeProbabilities(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.QMLAttribute)
member.summary: Computes the probabilities for an equidistant probability density function.
member.returns: Probabilities for an equidistant probability density function.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.FourierAttribute
member.summary: Attribute containing the fourier transformed probability density function.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.FourierAttribute.GetAttribute(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable)
member.summary: Returns the FourierAttribute of the IAttributable. If it has no FourierTimeAttribute null is returned.
member.param: IAttributable for which the FourierAttribute is requested.
member.returns: FourierAttribute of the IAttributable or null if it has no.

member.summary: Attaches a FourierAttribute to an object.
member.param: IAttributable to which the FourierAttribute shall be added.
The FourierAttribute which shall be added to the object.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.FourierAttribute.Clone
member.summary: Creates a Copy of the FourierAttribute.

member.summary: Adds a new measure to the MeasureAttribute.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute.AddMeasure(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new measure to the MeasureAttribute.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute.GetAttribute(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable)
member.summary: Returns the MeasureAttribute of a given object.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute.AddMeasure(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable,System.Int64)
member.summary: Adds a new measure to the MeasureAttribute of the IAttributable
member.param: An IAttributable that contains a MeasureAttribute.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute.Clone
member.summary: Creates a flat copy of the MeasureAttribute.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute.MinMeasure
member.summary: Returns the minimal execution time of all measures.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.MeasureAttribute.MaxMeasure
member.summary: Returns the maximum execution time of all measures.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute
member.summary: Attribute containig the probability of a transition. Each transition in a service-effect-automaton should have an ProbabilityAttribute

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute.ToString
member.summary: Retrieves a string representation of the object.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute.GetAttribute(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable)
member.summary: Returns the ProbabilityAttribute of the object. If it has no Probability null is returned.
member.param: IAttributable for which a ProbabilityAttribute is requested.
member.returns: ProbabilityAttribute of the IAttributable or null if it has none.

member.summary: Attaches a ProbabilityAttribute to an object.
member.param: Object where the Attribute shall be attached.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute.Equals(System.Object)
member.param: Object which is compared with this.
member.returns: True if both objects are equal. False else.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Create a new ProbabilityAttribute and assigns aValue to it.
member.param: Probability value. It can only be inbetween 0 and 1.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor with a probability of 1.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.ProbabilityAttribute.Clone
member.summary: Returns a copy of the ProbabilityAttribute.

member.name: T:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable
member.summary: Represents a random variable of a service-effect-transition or state. It defines the time behavior of a state or a transition in a service effect automaton.

remarks.pre:
Version history:
$Log$ Revision 1.1 2005/08/12 07:59:19 helgeh Initial impot after refactoring.
Math: - Added DiscretePDFunction. - Added Fast Fourier Transformation and FourierFunction. - Changed operations of DiscreteFunction. The operations are independent of the sampling rate. For a probability density function the sum of function values is a value in [0,1]. - Added to interface IDiscreteFunction: Sum,ExpandDomainPo2, Crop, NumberOfNullValues, AdjustSamplingRate, FunctionWithNValues, ToFile, ValueAt, DismissValuesSmalerThanN, ValueOf, MaximumDataValue - Altered MEthods: ExpandDomain, Scale, GetScaled, Convolution, Add
FSMTransformer: - Method SEFFValidity added. - The Method FSMWithIntermediateState now returns a FSM, where all time consumption is contained by the input symbols of the transitions.
WebserverSeffFactory: - All service effect automaton are now IFiniteStateMachines. No use of the PAlladio.ComponentModel.

RegExASTVisitor: - There are now two visitors. One for the calculation in time domain and one for the calculation in frequency domain.
RegularExpressions: - No changes.
XmlSeffParser: - Data class for configuration added. - ConfigReader added.
PerformanceCalculator: - Added interface IPerformanceCalculator. Added CalculatorFactory.
Unit Tests added. Updated documentation.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.GetAttribute(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable)
member.summary: Returns the RandomVariable of an object. If the RandomVariable doesnÂ´t have a RandomVariable an exception is thrown.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.SetAttribute(Palladio.Attributes.IAttributable,Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable)
member.summary: Attaches a RandomVariable to an object.
member.param: Object to which the RandomVariable shall be added.
The RandomVariable which shall be added to the object.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.#ctor
member.summary: Deault Constructor. The pdf has the execution time of 0 and a samplingrate of 0.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.#ctor(System.Int64,Palladio.Performance.Math.IDiscreteFunction)
member.param: New sampling rate for the function.
Probability density function for the RandomVariable.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.#ctor(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Double[])
member.param: y-values of the probability density function.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.AdjustSamplingRate(Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable@,Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable@)
member.summary: Adjusts the samplingrate of both RandomVariable to the same value.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the PDF. Only values unlike 0 are listed.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.Equals(System.Object)
member.param: Object which is compared with this.
member.returns: True if both objects are equal. False else.

member.name: M:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.Clone
member.summary: Returns a copy of the RandomVariable.

member.name: P:Palladio.Performance.Attributes.RandomVariable.ProbabilityDensityFunction
member.summary: Time consumption as a probability density function.
